titleText: Microsoft’s Surface Book 2 really is a beautiful beast
mainText: Using a 15-inch, 4.2-pound powerhouse like Microsoft’s new Surface Book 2 takes some time getting used to. It nearly fits into my backpack, but weighs on my back. It’s unwieldy to carry around the office,.

titleText: Microsoft releases first test build of Windows Server 1803
mainText: Microsoft released today, November 15, the first Insider test build of its next Windows Server feature update. Build 17035 of Windows Server is equivalent of its PC counterpart, codenamed 'Redstone 4.' Both the client and server.

titleText: Microsoft using AI to empower people living with disabilities
